kalan igena gaththe mahanuwara dharmarajayen.kalayath ekka kalange sagawila thiyana kala karaya awadi karanna oona nisado ,piyage abhawayen passe pawule anek nangila mallila usmahath karagena rakabala gena issarahata yana wagakim samudaya ohuge dewura mathata patawenawa.yantham me tharunaya es es si iwara kala witharayi.aneka wida wagakim ekka gathe bara gana nohitha hithe bara niwaganna kalan kalayuthu boho de karanawa ohu nuwara aapanashalawaka wadakarana athare thamange age thiyana attarakama hithe hayiyenma wahaganna bariwuna thana, ethana wada karapu wadimahal sewakayekta pahara dila eliyata bahinawa.dewarak nohitha thamange atha hiri watena tharam hari wada karala jiwithe nagitinna hethu hoyapu kalan ta gal walaka nathara wenna siddha wenne rupiyal ekayi haththa pahe dawase padiyata.shrilanka yudha hamudawe sewayata yana kalange jiwithe ethanimuth wenama thanakata geniyanna ohuta oona wenawa.hamudawen panala ena kalan awasanaye natharawenne mahanuwara mallika jayarupa shalawe wada karana eka ohuge jiwithaye anekuth rakiya atharin ohuta laba denne wenasma aakarayaka aaswadayak.ohutama uruma wechcha gathi pawathum nisado nosahena mithra samagamak kalan wata ekathuwela inne kisidu waga wibhagayakin thorawayi.ranjith ta kalanwa muna gahenne mallika eke wada karana kale.sinama ushne gahala thiyana ranjithta kalangen labena sahayogaya uparimayi kawwoth niwaradi.ee sahayogaya nisama ranjith perera nirmanaya kala prathama sinama pataya wana ‚Äúrayath dawalath‚Äù hi ranganaye yedenna awasthawa kalanta himiwenawa.ehi itha sulu ranganayaka nirathawena amarasiri kalansuriyage ranganaya gana warak di.bi nihalsinhayan ranjith samagin pawasa aththe ‚Äúkawda ara athanin ehata mehata yana hadaya.?miniha wade niyamata karanawa‚Äùkiyaya.
